mapinfo.detailsText:
You start next to a fordable river in a zone of dense forest. 
 Resources are generous but scattered in the maze of the Ozarks. 
 Take an aggressive approach to secure additional portions of the map and also don't forget the plateau across the river. 
 
 Native Civs: Cherokee 
 Mercenaries: Renegado / Pirate 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
